scripts.test: cucumber-js --require cucumber.conf.js --require test/step-definitions test/feature-files --format node_modules/cucumber-pretty --format json:report/cucumber_report.json
scripts.logintest: cucumber-js --require cucumber.conf.js --require test/step-definitions test/feature-files/login --format node_modules/cucumber-pretty --format json:report/cucumber_report.json
scripts.bookingtest: cucumber-js --require cucumber.conf.js --require test/step-definitions test/feature-files/booking --format node_modules/cucumber-pretty --format json:report/cucumber_report.json
